name: opuntia
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any of several kinds of cactus (= a desert plant that has long points like needles) that produce red or yellow flowers: They found an opuntia growing on the roof of their barn. Every variety of opuntia produces edible fruit.
More examplesFewer examplesThe prickly pear is a species of opuntia.Extracts of opuntia have been found to ease the symptoms of a hangover.Opuntias produce flattened pads that are covered in prickles.Opuntia was historically grown in Spain to attract the cochineal beetle.
